title: Peak power demand bounces back to nearly 241 GW on Tuesday
description: Earlier in May, the power ministry projected a peak power demand of 235 GW during daytime and 225 GW during evening hours for May and 240 GW during daytime and 235 GW during evening hours for June 2024.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
